name: Leather Armor
description: Armor made from tanned animal hide. It smells a bit funny, but it'd do the job.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Armor made from interlocking metal rings. It's a bit heavy, but it's very effective.

name: Plate Armor
description: Armor made from large metal plates. It's very heavy, but it's the best protection you can get.

name: Cloth Armor
description: Armor made from woven cloth. It's not very protective, but it's light and comfortable.

name: Robes
description: Flowing robes made from fine silk. They're not very protective, but they look very fancy.

name: Tunic
description: A simple tunic made from rough cloth. It's not very protective, but it's better than nothing.

name: Shirt
description: A simple shirt made from soft cotton. It's not very protective, but it's comfortable.
